solution_line_template: The longer sides are {num_longer_sides} in number so their total length of {num_longer_sides}*{longer_side_length}cm = <<{num_longer_sides}*{longer_side_length}={total_length_longer_sides}>>{total_length_longer_sides}cm

The rest of the length making up the short sides is {total_rope_length}-{total_length_longer_sides} = <<{total_rope_length}-{total_length_longer_sides}={remaining_length_for_short_sides}>>{remaining_length_for_short_sides} cm

There are {num_short_sides} equal short sides so each one is {remaining_length_for_short_sides}/{num_short_sides} = <<{remaining_length_for_short_sides}/{num_short_sides}={length_of_each_short_side}>>{length_of_each_short_side}cm
